name: My Hero Academia
description: My Hero Academia is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Kōhei Horikoshi. It has been serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump since July 2014, and 20 volumes have been collected in tankōbon format.
producers: Dentsu, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Movic, Sony Music Entertainment, TOHO animation, Shueisha

description: My Hero Academia 2 is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Kōhei Horikoshi. It has been serialized in Weekly Shōnen Jump since July 2014, and 20 volumes have been collected in tankōbon format.

name: One Punch Man
description: One Punch Man is a Japanese superhero webcomic created by the artist ONE. It tells the story of Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks to find a worthy opponent after growing bored with his overwhelming strength.
producers: TV Tokyo, Bandai Visual, Lantis, Asatsu DK, Banpresto, Good Smile Company, Shueisha, East Japan Marketing & Communications

name: One Punch Man 2
description: One Punch Man 2 is the second season of the Japanese superhero webcomic created by the artist ONE. It continues the story of Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch but seeks to find a worthy opponent after growing bored with his overwhelming strength.
producers: TV Tokyo, Bandai Visual, Lantis, Asatsu DK, Banpresto, Good Smile Company, Shueisha, East Japan Marketing & Communications

name: Haikyuu!!
description: Haikyuu!! is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Haruichi Furudate. It follows the story of Shoyo Hinata, a high school student who aspires to become a great volleyball player despite his short stature. He joins the Karasuno High School volleyball team and together with his teammates, they aim to compete in national tournaments.
producers: Mainichi Broadcasting System, TOHO animation, Shueisha

name: Haikyuu!! Second Season
description: Haikyuu!! Second Season continues the story of Shoyo Hinata and the Karasuno High School volleyball team as they face stronger opponents and strive to improve their skills. With new challenges and intense matches, they aim to reach new heights in the world of high school volleyball.
producers: Mainichi Broadcasting System, TOHO animation, Shueisha

name: Haikyuu!! Third Season
description: Haikyuu!! Third Season depicts the intense battle between the Karasuno High School volleyball team and their strongest rivals, Shiratorizawa Academy. As they compete in the Spring High School Volleyball Nationals, the players give their all to achieve victory and prove their worth on the national stage.
producers: Mainichi Broadcasting System, TOHO animation, Shueisha

name: Haikyuu!! Fourth Season
description: Haikyuu!! Fourth Season continues the story of the Karasuno High School volleyball team as they face new challenges and strive to reach the national tournament. With their determination and teamwork, they aim to surpass their limits and prove themselves as one of the top teams in Japan.
producers: Mainichi Broadcasting System, TOHO animation, Shueisha

name: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description: Kimetsu no Yaiba, also known as Demon Slayer, is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Koyoharu Gotouge. It follows the story of Tanjiro Kamado, a young boy who becomes a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered and his sister Nezuko is turned into a demon. Tanjiro sets out on a journey to avenge his family and find a cure for his sister's condition.
producers: Aniplex, Shueisha

name: Attack on Titan
description: Attack on Titan, also known as Shingeki no Kyojin, is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Hajime Isayama. It is set in a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to the existence of giant humanoid creatures known as Titans. The story follows Eren Yeager and his friends as they join the military to fight against the Titans and uncover the mysteries surrounding their existence.
producers: Production I.G, Dentsu, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Pony Canyon, Kodansha, Mad Box, Shingeki no Kyojin Team, Pony Canyon Enterprise

name: Attack on Titan Season 2
description: Attack on Titan Season 2 continues the story of Eren Yeager and his friends as they face new threats from the Titans. As they uncover more about the truth behind the Titans and the walls that protect humanity, they must fight to survive and protect their loved ones.
producers: Production I.G, Dentsu, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Pony Canyon, Kodansha, Mad Box, Shingeki no Kyojin Team, Pony Canyon Enterprise

name: Attack on Titan Season 3
description: Attack on Titan Season 3 continues the story of Eren Yeager and his friends as they face new challenges and uncover more secrets about the Titans and the world they live in. With the truth becoming clearer, they must make difficult choices and fight against powerful enemies to protect humanity.
producers: Production I.G, Dentsu, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Pony Canyon, Kodansha, Techno Sound, Pony Canyon Enterprise

name: Attack on Titan Season 3 Part 2
description: Attack on Titan Season 3 Part 2 continues the story of Eren Yeager and his friends as they face the most dangerous enemies yet. With the truth about the Titans and the world they live in revealed, they must fight for their survival and the future of humanity.
producers: Production I.G, Dentsu, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Pony Canyon, Kodansha, Techno Sound, Pony Canyon Enterprise

name: Attack on Titan Season 4
description: Attack on Titan Season 4 is the final season of the series. It follows the story of Eren Yeager and his friends as they face the ultimate battle against the Titans and fight for the freedom of humanity. With new alliances and betrayals, they must make sacrifices and confront the truth about their world.
producers: Production I.G, Dentsu, Mainichi Broadcasting System, Pony Canyon, Kodansha, Techno Sound, Pony Canyon Enterprise

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Jujutsu Kaisen is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Gege Akutami. It follows the story of Yuji Itadori, a high school student with exceptional physical abilities who becomes involved in the world of curses and jujutsu sorcery after swallowing a cursed object. As he joins the Tokyo Metropolitan Jujutsu Technical High School, Yuji must learn to control his newfound powers and protect humanity from dangerous curses.
producers: TOHO animation, Shueisha

name: Jujutsu Kaisen 2
description: Jujutsu Kaisen 2 continues the story of Yuji Itadori and his friends as they face new challenges and powerful curses. With the threat of the cursed spirits growing stronger, they must train harder and work together to protect humanity from the dangers that lurk in the shadows.
producers: TOHO animation, Shueisha

name: Tokyo Revengers
description: Takemichi Hanagaki's second year of middle school was the highest point in his life. He had respect, a gang of friends he could count on, and even a girlfriend. But that was twelve years ago. Today, he's a nobody: a washed-up nonentity made fun of by children and always forced to apologize to his younger boss. A sudden news report on the Tokyo Manji Gang's cruel murder of the only girlfriend he ever had alongside her brother only adds insult to injury. Half a second before a train ends his pitiful life for good, Takemichi flashes back to that same day 12 years ago, when he was still dating Hinata Tachibana.
producers: TOHO animation, Shueisha
